CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To verify the accuracy of the J sc measurement results , external quantum efficiencies ( EQEs ) of solar cells were measured under illumination of monochromatic light.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| Monochromatic light |

In this paragraph, the material name is "monochromatic light". Monochromatic light is light that consists of a single wavelength or a narrow range of wavelengths.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| Monochromatic light |

In this paragraph, the material name is referred to as "monochromatic light". Monochromatic light is a type of light that consists of a single wavelength or a narrow range of wavelengths.
